text: Pentlandite is a mineral containing nickel and iron. It is one of the main ores of nickel. It has the chemical formula . Most samples have slightly more nickel than iron. == Refining == Pentlandite can be smelted using oxygen. This releases sulfur dioxide gas and leaves behind iron(III) oxide and nickel(II) oxide. The iron is then removed as slag. == Sources == Category:Sulfide minerals Category:Ores Category:Nickel minerals Category:Iron minerals
title: Pentlandite
